definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media

sentences.english: No special streaming server is required.
sentences.chinese: 不需要專門的流媒體服務器。

sentences.english: For a better understanding of the features and technology used in todays streaming service.
sentences.chinese: 如需功能和技術更好地瞭解今天的流媒體服務使用。

sentences.english: Imeem is a social networking site that offers streaming music.
sentences.chinese: Immem是一個提供流媒體音樂的社交網絡站點。

sentences.english: It tried to become a general-purpose streaming media player enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 它嘗試成爲一款通用型的流媒體播放外殼。

sentences.english: Streaming media is the continuous-flow media which is in the use of transmission Technology.
sentences.chinese: 流媒體就是使用流式傳輸技術的連續時基媒體。

sentences.english: The design of the mutual multimedia plat of distance instruction based the technology of streaming media.
sentences.chinese: 基於流媒體的交互式多媒體遠程學習平臺設計。

sentences.english: The inclusion of a streaming media server facilitates the use of video in presentations.
sentences.chinese: 流媒體服務器的加入促進了形象呈現中視頻的使用。

sentences.english: Moreover, the main frame of the Rotate Multicast System is analysed.
sentences.chinese: 詳細描述了流媒體輪播系統的基本構架。

sentences.english: This paper studies will FGS coding technology and P2P streaming media best combination.
sentences.chinese: 研究了將FGS編碼技術與P2P流媒體的最佳結合。

sentences.english: How about $8/month for the streaming web version?
sentences.chinese: 或者每月8塊上網用流媒體收聽？

sentences.english: Buffer management is a very critical problem in large-scale video streaming servers.
sentences.chinese: 在大規模流媒體服務中，緩存管理是非常關鍵的問題。

sentences.english: Known to cause the host audio to skip if upload bandwidth is insufficient for the stream.
sentences.chinese: 已知當流媒體的加載帶寬不足時，可導致主音頻跳過。

sentences.english: Free streaming will not save the music business.
sentences.chinese: 免費的流媒體不能拯救商業音樂。

sentences.english: A library for playback of various streamed audio formats used in video games.
sentences.chinese: 各種播放流媒體視頻遊戲使用的音頻格式。

sentences.english: Premium Branded Slates are presented in-stream before the content begins.
sentences.chinese: 優質品牌石板載流媒體內容開始之前。
